title: Ad hoc statistical release: UK Sea Fisheries Statistics
description: Published in response to the COVID-19 pandemic to provide timely evidence on impacts on commercial sea fishing activity
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll to latest release  click on the link another page will open scroll to  documents  and open the XLS spreadsheet
sizingNotes: 4 Simple tables with there are some footnotes, a mixture of measures  types of value (£'000s) and quantity (Tons).   Period is month/year currently March 2019/2020.
notes: Discussions  with Rebecca Cavanagh please ensure that the warning re provisional data and footnotes are included for all tables.  Additionally each release will be for a specific month and may require additional work to create a time series?
